actions.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment considered as adopted: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 580, in lieu of the amendments in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committees on Agriculture and Financial Services now printed in the bill, an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 119-6, modified by the amendment printed in part B of House Report 119-199 is considered adopted.
